scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && eslint -c eslint.config.mjs --quiet --cache --cache-location frontend/.eslintcache $(git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMR HEAD -- frontend/ | xargs)
scripts.lint:server: cd server && eslint -c eslint.config.mjs --quiet --cache --cache-location server/.eslintcache $(git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMR HEAD -- server/ | xargs)
